The 'Southern University System' is a system of universities in the U.S. state
of Louisiana. Its headquarters are at the Joseph Samuel Clark Administration
Building on the property of the Southern University campus in Baton Rouge. The
Southern University System is the only historically black college system in the
United States. http://www.sus.edu/AboutUs.asp http://www.sus.edu/-
CatSubCat/CatSubCat.asp?p9=CSC11
